post.description:
> Import data with json parameter. 
call this the method before evaluate or train

### Arguments:
    project_id {str} -- [project uid]
    model_id {str} -- [model uid]

### Keyword Arguments:
    dataset_json {Dataset} -- [description] (default: {None})
            Example:
            ```   
            {
                "questions": [
                    {
                        "question": "What is your name?",
                        "answer": "I am chatbot."
                    },
                    {
                        "question": "What is your name?",
                        "answer": "My name is Elsa."
                    }
                ]
            }
            ```

### Returns:
    [json] -- [data info]

> Import data to pandas dataframe. 
call this the method before evaluate or train

### Arguments:
    project_id {str} -- [project uid]
    model_id {str} -- [model uid]
    file {File} -- [multipart file, upload any supported type.
                    - if file type is text/md, please provide question                                 and answer prefix
                    - if file type is excel, please provide sheet name
                    ]
### Returns:
    [json] -- [data info]

> Train Intent-Example using json

### Arguments:
    project_id {str} -- [description]
    model_id {str} -- [description]

### Keyword Arguments:
    dataset_json {Dataset} -- [description] (default: {None})
            Example:
            ```    
            {
                "intents": [
                    {
                        "intent_name": "OS_VERSION",
                        "examples": [
                            "Which OS version is compatible with                                         ABA Mobile Banking App?",
                            "which Android version that compatible?",
                            "តើប្រព័ន្ធប្រតិបត្តិការណាដែលត្រូវគ្នាជាមួយកម្មវិធីធនាគារអេប៊ីអេ។"
                        ]
                    },
                    {
                        "intent_name": "INTERNET_CONNECTION",
                        "examples": [
                            "Is an Internet connection mandatory?",
                            "Can I use it offline?",
                            "តើការតភ្ជាប់អ៊ីនធឺណិតចាំបាច់ទេ?",
                            "តើខ្ញុំអាចប្រើវាក្រៅអ៊ីនធឺណិតបានទេ?"
                        ]
                    },
                    {
                        "intent_name": "DOWNLOAD_CHARGE",
                        "examples": [
                            "What are the charges for downloading                                         and using ABA Mobile Banking App?",
                            "តើត្រូវចំណាយប៉ុន្មានដើម្បីដោនឡូតនិងប្រើប្                                        រាស់កម្មវិធីធនាគារចល័តរបស់ធនាគារ ABA?",
                            "តើធនាគារចល័តអេប៊ីអេអាចទាញយកដោយឥតគិតថ្លៃបានទេ?"
                        ]
                    }
                ]
            }
            ```
    mode {EmbeddingMode} -- [Embedding used to training]                 (default: {EmbeddingMode.USE})

### Returns:
    [json] -- [info for trained ]

> Train Intent-Example using json

            ```    
                            "តើត្រូវចំណាយប៉ុន្មានដើម្បីដោនឡូតនិងប្រើប្                                        រាស់កម្មវិធីធនាគារចល័តរបស់ធនាគារ ABA?",
                            "តើធនាគារចល័តអេប៊ីអេអាចទាញយកដោយឥតគិតថ្លៃបានទេ?"
                        ]
                    }
                ]

            ```
    mode {EmbeddingMode} -- [Embedding used to training]                 (default: {EmbeddingMode.USE})

### Returns:

get.description:
> Evaluate dataset(which has been imported before)

### Arguments:
    request {Request} -- [request for auth, no need to provide]
    project_id {str} -- [project_id of data]
    data_id {str} -- [data_id]

### Keyword Arguments:
    mode {EmbeddingMode} -- [Embedding type for evaluating]
                            (default: {EmbeddingMode.USE})

### Returns:
    CSV File -- [csv file from evaluated]

post.description:
> Evaluate excel file

### Arguments:
    input_list {List[dict]} -- [list of intent and example pair]
    Sample (json data):
    ```                    
        [
            {
                "Intent":"GENERIC_STATEMENT",
                "Example":"what is e-posted list?"
            },
            {
                "Intent":"WITHDRAWAL_SUBMISSION_RM1MIL",
                "Example":"Boleh tak saya apply secara online?"
            },
        ]
    ```
### Keyword Arguments:
    mode {EmbeddingMode} -- [embedding mode for evaluation]
        (default: {EmbeddingMode.USE})


### Return item:
- Similarity = distance to closest data. High is good
- Intent = source Intent
- Example = source Example
- Conflict with = closest intent
- Similar utterance = closest example
- Too long = if source example more than 200 (text treshold)
- Conflict = if source intent is different with closest intent
- Lack of support = if similarity  < 0.8 (similarity treshold). False is good
- Good = if not lack of support and not conflict and not too long


### Json return sample:
    ```
    [
        {
            "Similarity": 0.2719572820481222,
            "Intent": "GENERIC_STATEMENT",
            "Example": "what is e-posted list?",
            "Conflict with": "WITHDRAWAL_EDUCATION_IPP_LIST",
            "Similar utterance": "Is PERKESO is on the list?",
            "Too long": false,
            "Conflict": true,
            "Lack of support": true,
            "Good": false
        },
        {
            "Similarity": 0.5256810431267805,
            "Intent": "WITHDRAWAL_SUBMISSION_RM1MIL",
            "Example": "Boleh tak saya apply secara online?",
            "Conflict with": "WITHDRAWAL_EDUCATION_STATEMENT_BALANCELOAN",
            "Similar utterance": "EKlaau saya print statement melalui online boleh guna tak?",
            "Too long": false,
            "Conflict": true,
            "Lack of support": true,
            "Good": false
        }
    ]
    ```

get.description:
> Load model and dataset

### Arguments:
    project_id {str} -- [project uid]
    model_id {str} -- [project uid]
    version_id {str} -- [version id]

### Returns:
    [json] -- [all loaded model]

> Unload model and dataset

### Arguments:
    project_id {str} -- [project uid]
    model_id {str} -- [project uid]
    version_id {str} -- [version id]

### Returns:
    [json] -- [all loaded model]

> Generate text


### Keyword Arguments:
    text {str} -- Text to create augmentation
    num_output {int} -- Number text output
    use_back_translation {bool} -- True to activate back translation.                 Default: False.
    origin {LangCode} -- Language code of source text, set None if not sure                 system will automatically detect the language. (Default: None)
    dest {LangCode} -- Language code of target text, set None to avoid                 translation. (Default: None)

#### Returns:
    [json] -- [list of genrated model]
